**ğŸ‰ First Stable Early Access Release**

This is the first stable Early Access release of **EasyDesktop**.

Version 2.2 marks an important milestone: the project is now considered stable for real-world usage while continuing to evolve through Early Access.

### âœ¨ Whatâ€™s New in This Release
* Fixed several substantial bugs reported during the beta phase.
* Performance optimizations across the editor and compiler.
* Numerous new and improved examples to help you get started faster and build better applications.

### ğŸ›’ Availability
EasyDesktop 2.2 is available for download on Gumroad:
https://emosoft.gumroad.com/l/easypydesktop

### âš ï¸ Early Access Limitations
This Early Access version has some restrictions:
* EXE generation is disabled
* Custom application icon is disabled
* Splash screen customization is disabled

### ğŸ”“ Full Version & License
To unlock all features, you need to purchase a paid license on Gumroad and activate it inside the application.

You will be able to obtain a license when it becomes available at:
https://emosoft.gumroad.com/l/easypydesktoplicense

Thank you for supporting the project during its Early Access stage!
